user_question: How can I optimize the cost of running a Kubernetes cluster on AWS, and can you generate a diagram of a cost-efficient architecture?
final_answer: To optimize the cost of running a Kubernetes cluster on AWS, consider using Spot Instances, right-sizing your nodes, using auto-scaling, and leveraging AWS Savings Plans. Diagram of a cost-efficient architecture generated. Spot Instances help reduce costs by allowing you to bid on spare AWS capacity at reduced rates.

function.name: search
function.arguments: Searching for information on how Spot Instances reduce costs.

steps.content: Spot Instances allow you to bid on spare AWS capacity at reduced rates, often significantly cheaper than On-Demand pricing.

To optimize the cost of running a Kubernetes cluster on AWS, consider using Spot Instances, right-sizing your nodes, using auto-scaling, and leveraging AWS Savings Plans. Diagram of a cost-efficient architecture generated. Spot Instances help reduce costs by allowing you to bid on spare AWS capacity at reduced rates.
